author: Bloomberg
title: How Coronavirus is shaking up the moral universe
description: The epidemic forces everyone to confront deep questions of human existence, questions so profound that they have previously been answered, in many different ways, by the greatest philosophers. What is right and what is wrong? What can individuals expect from …
content: By John AuthersThe coronavirus pandemic is a test. It’s a test of medical capacity and political will. It’s a test of endurance and forbearance, for believers a test of religious faith. It’s a test, too, of a different kind of faith, in the strength of the id… [+14870 chars]
